attributes.action: postpone, for at least a month, the changeover from British Summer Time to Greenwich Mean Time
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people suggest bringing forward the change to B.S.T. but by the end of February it stays light until about 5.30, if not 6, already.  I really hate it when the clocks go back; I do understand the rationale that without the clocks going back at all children would be going to school in the dark (though this is probably less important now that most are taken by car) but does this really apply as early as the end of October?
